bibl.title: The Jews of Egypt. From Rameses II to Emperor Hadrian. Translated by Robert CORNMAN. With a Foreword by Shaye J.D. COHEN.
bibl.note: Version anglaise de: Les Juifs d'Égypte. De Ramsès II à Hadrien (Paris, 1991).
MODRZEJEWSKI (MÉLÈZE MODRZEJEWSKI) Joseph, The Jews of Egypt. From Rameses II to Emperor Hadrian. Translated by Robert CORNMAN. With a Foreword by Shaye J.D. COHEN.
Edinburgh, T. & T. Clark, 1995, 8°, xxii-279 pp., 32 figg. ISBN 0-5670-9739-0. £29.95.
